category: news
title: "Tellimer Expands AI Bond Data Collaboration With 7 Chord"
excerpt: "As Tellimer aspires to be the single point of entry for all Emerging Markets data, analysis and research, Tellimer and 7 Chord will expand an agreement, reached in 2022, to publish 7 Chord's end-of-month Emerging Market bond pricing data on the Tellimer Insights platform."
